attributes.action: Stop People selling concert tickets on Ebay and other such sites
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How many times have you spent hours on the phone trying to get tickets to concerts or other such events and after hours of waiting or trying to book online you are unsuccessful, then to your absolute dismay they are on sale on E Bay minutes after they come on sale. I really do not think it should be legal for people to profit on events that have a set price, thus preventing people that actually want the tickets from going.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
